name: Lucero
description: '''Lucero''' is an American [[country music|country]]-[[punk rock|punk]]/[[alternative country]]/[[alternative rock]] band based in [[Memphis, Tennessee]], United States. Lucero's sound has been described as a "synthesis of soul, rock, and country [that] is distinctly Memphisian." They have released 12 albums and one live DVD, mostly through their own label. The band mainly tours around North America.
